Pre-Game Insights: Gregor Kobel will be the new number 1 for the Swiss national team, replacing Yann Sommer.
Kobel confirmed that playing in the national team is his greatest dream and he is proud to wear the national team jersey.
The Swiss national team will kick off the new international season with an away game against Denmark on Thursday.
Yakin mentioned that there are various options for the central defense and they will try to field the best players.
Granit Xhaka will decide who takes the penalties in the national team, and Kobel will be one of the options.
The national team wants to play successful football and take the Nations League seriously because it's also important for the World Cup qualifiers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gregor Kobel is in a great mood and feels honored to wear the national team jersey.
Kobel has great respect for Yann Sommer's career and hasn't commented on the topic until now.
Kobel will face a new challenge in the national team that is not comparable to club football.
Yakin is trying to field the best players and can also imagine Zakaria in defense.
Others: Yann Sommer has retired from the national team two weeks ago.
Kobel has been in Yann Sommer's shadow for a long time and had to wait a long time for his chance.
The media conference in the live ticker has ended.
Kobel is part of the new national team squad.
